verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥רֶד <S%H3381><s%> went down שִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H8123><s%> And Samson תִּמְנָ֑תָה <S%H8553><s%> to Timnath וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> and saw אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> a woman בְּתִמְנָ֖תָה <S%H8553><s%> in Timnath מִבְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַיַּ֗עַל <S%H5927><s%> And he came up וַיַּגֵּד֙ <S%H5046><s%> and told לְאָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> his father וּלְאִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> a woman רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen בְתִמְנָ֖תָה <S%H8553><s%> in Timnath מִבְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now קְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> now therefore get אוֹתָ֥הּ <S%H853><s%> לִּ֖י לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> her for me to wife

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֜וֹ אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> Then his father וְאִמּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother הַאֵין֩ <S%H369><s%> unto him [Is there] never בִּבְנ֨וֹת <S%H1323><s%> among the daughters אַחֶ֤יךָ <S%H251><s%> of thy brethren וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> or among all my people אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> a woman כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you הוֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> that thou goest לָקַ֣חַת <S%H3947><s%> to take אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> a wife מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> Philistine הָעֲרֵלִ֑ים <S%H6189><s%> of the uncircumcised וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שִׁמְשׁ֤וֹן <S%H8123><s%> Samson אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> unto his father אוֹתָ֣הּ <S%H853><s%> קַֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> Get לִ֔י כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he יָשְׁרָ֥ה <S%H3474><s%> good בְעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> affliction

וְאָבִ֨יו <S%H1><s%> But his father וְאִמּ֜וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> knew כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> that it was מֵיְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> not that it [was] of the LORD הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תֹאֲנָ֥ה <S%H8385><s%> an occasion הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> that he sought מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> against the Philistines וּבָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> for at that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines מֹשְׁלִ֥ים <S%H4910><s%> had dominion בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel פ

וַיֵּ֧רֶד <S%H3381><s%> down שִׁמְשׁ֛וֹן <S%H8123><s%> Samson וְאָבִ֥יו <S%H1><s%> and his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother תִּמְנָ֑תָה <S%H8553><s%> to Timnath וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far כַּרְמֵ֣י <S%H3754><s%> to the vineyards תִמְנָ֔תָה <S%H8553><s%> of Timnath וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and behold כְּפִ֣יר <S%H3715><s%> and behold a young אֲרָי֔וֹת <S%H738><s%> lion שֹׁאֵ֖ג <S%H7580><s%> roared לִקְרָאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H7125><s%> against

וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <S%H6743><s%> came mightily עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> and ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> And the Spirit יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַֽיְשַׁסְּעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H8156><s%> upon him and he rent כְּשַׁסַּ֣ע <S%H8156><s%> him as he would have rent הַגְּדִ֔י <S%H1423><s%> a kid וּמְא֖וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> and [he had] nothing אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> had בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגִּיד֙ <S%H5046><s%> but he told לְאָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> not his father וּלְאִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> or his mother אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> what he had done

וַיֵּ֖רֶד <S%H3381><s%> And he went down וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and talked לָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> with the woman וַתִּישַׁ֖ר <S%H3474><s%> good בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> affliction שִׁמְשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H8123><s%> Samson

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> he returned מִיָּמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> And after a time לְקַחְתָּ֔הּ <S%H3947><s%> to take וַיָּ֣סַר <S%H5493><s%> her and he turned aside לִרְא֔וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מַפֶּ֣לֶת <S%H4658><s%> the carcase הָאַרְיֵ֑ה <S%H738><s%> of the lion וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עֲדַ֧ת <S%H5712><s%> and behold [there was] a swarm דְּבוֹרִ֛ים <S%H1682><s%> of bees בִּגְוִיַּ֥ת <S%H1472><s%> in the carcase הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <S%H738><s%> of the lion וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> and honey

וַיִּרְדֵּ֣הוּ <S%H7287><s%> And he took אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כַּפָּ֗יו <S%H3709><s%> thereof in his hands וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and came הָלוֹךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went וְאָכֹ֔ל <S%H398><s%> eating וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> to his father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> and mother וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and he gave לָהֶ֖ם וַיֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> them and they did eat וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> but he told לָהֶ֔ם כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> out מִגְּוִיַּ֥ת <S%H1472><s%> out of the carcase הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <S%H738><s%> of the lion רָדָ֥ה <S%H7287><s%> not them that he had taken הַדְּבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> the honey

וַיֵּ֥רֶד <S%H3381><s%> went down אָבִ֖יהוּ <S%H1><s%> So his father אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> unto the woman וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> and Samson מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <S%H4960><s%> there a feast כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> this יַעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> to do הַבַּחוּרִֽים׃ <S%H970><s%> for so used the young men

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּרְאוֹתָ֣ם <S%H7200><s%> And it came to pass when they saw אוֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> him that they brought שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty מֵֽרֵעִ֔ים <S%H4828><s%> companions וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> And Samson אָחֽוּדָה־ <S%H2330><s%> unto them I will now put forth נָּ֥א <S%H4994><s%> now לָכֶ֖ם חִידָ֑ה <S%H2420><s%> a riddle אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הַגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> unto you if ye can certainly תַּגִּידוּ֩ <S%H5046><s%> declare אוֹתָ֨הּ <S%H853><s%> לִ֜י שִׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> it me within the seven יְמֵ֤י <S%H3117><s%> days הַמִּשְׁתֶּה֙ <S%H4960><s%> of the feast וּמְצָאתֶ֔ם <S%H4672><s%> and find [it] out וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> then I will give לָכֶם֙ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> you thirty סְדִינִ֔ים <S%H5466><s%> sheets וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty חֲלִפֹ֥ת <S%H2487><s%> change בְּגָדִֽים׃ <S%H899><s%> of garments

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תוּכְלוּ֮ <S%H3201><s%> But if ye cannot לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> declare לִי֒ וּנְתַתֶּ֨ם <S%H5414><s%> [it] me then shall ye give אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you לִי֙ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> me thirty סְדִינִ֔ים <S%H5466><s%> sheets וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty חֲלִיפ֣וֹת <S%H2487><s%> change בְּגָדִ֑ים <S%H899><s%> of garments וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> And they said ל֔וֹ ח֥וּדָה <S%H2330><s%> unto him Put forth חִידָתְךָ֖ <S%H2420><s%> thy riddle וְנִשְׁמָעֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H8085><s%> that we may hear

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לָהֶ֗ם מֵהָֽאֹכֵל֙ <S%H398><s%> unto them Out of the eater יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> came forth מַאֲכָ֔ל <S%H3978><s%> meat וּמֵעַ֖ז <S%H5794><s%> and out of the strong יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> came forth מָת֑וֹק <S%H4966><s%> sweetness וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכְל֛וּ <S%H3201><s%> And they could לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> expound הַחִידָ֖ה <S%H2420><s%> the riddle שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> not in three יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> And it came to pass on the seventh וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> that they said לְאֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> unto Samson's פַּתִּ֣י <S%H6601><s%> Entice אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִישֵׁ֗ךְ <S%H376><s%> thy husband וְיַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> that he may declare לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣חִידָ֔ה <S%H2420><s%> unto us the riddle פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or נִשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> lest we burn אוֹתָ֛ךְ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֖יךְ <S%H1><s%> thee and thy father's בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire הַלְיָרְשֵׁ֕נוּ <S%H3423><s%> us to take that we have קְרָאתֶ֥ם <S%H7121><s%> have ye called לָ֖נוּ הֲלֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> not

וַתֵּבְךְּ֩ <S%H1058><s%> wept אֵ֨שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife שִׁמְשׁ֜וֹן <S%H8123><s%> And Samson's עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> before וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> before him and said רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> but שְׂנֵאתַ֙נִי֙ <S%H8130><s%> Thou dost but hate וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֲהַבְתָּ֔נִי <S%H157><s%> me and lovest הַֽחִידָ֥ה <S%H2420><s%> a riddle חַ֙דְתָּ֙ <S%H2330><s%> me not thou hast put forth לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> of my people וְלִ֖י לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not הִגַּ֑דְתָּה <S%H5046><s%> and hast not told וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> [it] me And he said לָ֗הּ הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> to her Behold לְאָבִ֧י <S%H1><s%> [it] my father וּלְאִמִּ֛י <S%H517><s%> nor my mother לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not הִגַּ֖דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> unto her Behold I have not told וְלָ֥ךְ אַגִּֽיד׃ <S%H5046><s%> and shall I tell

וַתֵּ֤בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> And she wept עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> before שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> before him the seven הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> while הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> lasted לָהֶ֖ם הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <S%H4960><s%> while their feast וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> lasted בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> and it came to pass on the seventh וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> that he told לָהּ֙ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> her because הֱצִיקַ֔תְהוּ <S%H6693><s%> her because she lay sore וַתַּגֵּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> upon him and she told הַחִידָ֖ה <S%H2420><s%> the riddle לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to the children עַמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5971><s%> of her people

וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֩ אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> the men הָעִ֜יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> unto him on the seventh בְּטֶ֙רֶם֙ <S%H2962><s%> before יָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> went down הַחַ֔רְסָה <S%H2775><s%> before the sun מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What מָּת֣וֹק <S%H4966><s%> What [is] sweeter מִדְּבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> honey וּמֶ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What עַ֖ז <S%H5794><s%> is stronger מֵאֲרִ֑י <S%H738><s%> lion וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶ֔ם לוּלֵא֙ <S%H3884><s%> unto them If חֲרַשְׁתֶּ֣ם <S%H2790><s%> ye had not plowed בְּעֶגְלָתִ֔י <S%H5697><s%> with my heifer לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not מְצָאתֶ֖ם <S%H4672><s%> ye had not found out חִידָתִֽי׃ <S%H2420><s%> my riddle

וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <S%H6743><s%> came עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> Then ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> And the Spirit יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֵּ֨רֶד <S%H3381><s%> upon him and he went down אַשְׁקְל֜וֹן <S%H831><s%> to Ashkelon וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and slew מֵהֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H1992><s%> like שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> of them and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲלִ֣יצוֹתָ֔ם <S%H2488><s%> their spoil וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and gave הַחֲלִיפ֔וֹת <S%H2487><s%> change לְמַגִּידֵ֖י <S%H5046><s%> of garments unto them which expounded הַחִידָ֑ה <S%H2420><s%> the riddle וַיִּ֣חַר <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> And his anger וַיַּ֖עַל <S%H5927><s%> and he went up בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִֽיהוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> to his father's פ

וַתְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <S%H8123><s%> But Samson's לְמֵ֣רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H4828><s%> was [given] to his companion אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who רֵעָ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> whom he had used as his friend לֽוֹ׃
